column4: i suppose the problem is, that now that i have installed linux for the first time, what do I do next?
damn xchat
i give up
Huh?
my xchat keeps on crashing for no reason
xchat or xchat-gnome?
i am not sure, how will i find out, if it helps i am running ubuntu 7
'sudo apt-get install xchat' and try 'xchat' in the terminal. I dont like xchat-gnome, i just use the normal xchat program.
is xchat normally a command line program?
no its a full gui X based chat program. Xchat-gnome is a simpilified version that most people seem to Hate.
running stuff from a terminal, will also print out any error messages/reasons for crashing
your right it looks like the other xchat, with a few differences
and much less damage to your wallet. :)
thats ok, Packman_2 is me in chatzilla, and Packman_2
thats ok, Packman_2 is me in chatzilla, and Packman_e is me in xchat
Python is fairly good and welldocumented for a total-starter to any programing.

python is supported on abut anything it seems :)
its hard to learn 'c' when you havent even grasped the concept of 'variables' and stuff. :) Python books are out that will gently introuduce you to programing fundamentals.
